title: "unteraly" sans type
content:
Any idea on what this typeface is? ![Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121135654im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38687.gif)

 [‹ (x) ilovejezebel.com - DuCahier {Franz}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121135654/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5369 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Bud Light billboard ad - Myriad {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121135654/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5337 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Marius Ursache

comments.content: Now that is a _muy_ bizarre face. Where does your sample come from?
I think it's the custom typeface Miles Newlyn designed for David Carson.

It's the typeface used in Adams Morioka's latest book, "Logo Design Workbook".   
   
I will ask Miles if he designed it.
no luck. It's not Miles' typeface.
